content.raw:
Hi Lev, 

I have tried the previous version of the installer - cannot get it to install either. 

Now downloading the debugging tools - will have a look a this again tomorrow to see.

Specs of my computer and version of python:
Intel Core2 Duo E8500, 8 GByte RAM, Win7 SP1
Python 2.7.5 (default, May 15 2013, 22:44:16) [MSC v.1500 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32

Many thanks, 
Achim
